name: Commerce Cloud Orders3
source:
$includeTemplate('global')
<#compress>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<orders xmlns="http://www.demandware.com/xml/impex/order/2006-10-31">
	<#list Orders as Order>
    <order order-no="${Order.OrderNumber}">
        <@incx Order "order-date"></@incx>
        <@incx Order "created-by"></@incx>
        <@incx Order "original-order-no"></@incx>
        <@incx Order "currency"></@incx>
        <@incx Order "customer-locale"></@incx>
        <@incx Order "taxation"></@incx>
        <@incx Order "invoice-no"></@incx>
        <#if Order['customer']?? >
        <customer>
            <@incx Order.customer "customer-no"></@incx>
            <@incx Order.customer "customer-name"></@incx>
            <@incx Order.customer "customer-email"></@incx>
			<#if Order.customer['billing-address']?? >
            <billing-address>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "first-name"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "last-name"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "address1"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "address2"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "city"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "state-code"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "country-code"></@incx>
	            <@incx Order.customer['billing-address'] "phone"></@incx>
            </billing-address>
            </#if>
        </customer>
        </#if>
        <#if Order['status']?? >
        <status>
            <@incx Order.status "order-status"></@incx>
            <@incx Order.status "shipping-status"></@incx>
            <@incx Order.status "confirmation-status"></@incx>
            <@incx Order.status "payment-status"></@incx>
        </status>
        </#if>
        <@incx Order "current-order-no"></@incx>
        <product-lineitems>
			<#list Order['product-lineitems'] as LineItem>
            <product-lineitem>
            	<@incx LineItem "net-price"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "tax"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "gross-price"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "base-price"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "lineitem-text"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "tax-basis"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "position"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "product-id"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "product-name"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "quantity"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "tax-rate"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "shipment-id"></@incx>
            	<@incx LineItem "gift"></@incx>
            </product-lineitem>
	        </#list>
        </product-lineitems>
        <#if Order['shipping-lineitems']??>
	        <shipping-lineitems>
        	<#list Order['shipping-lineitems'] as ShippingLineItem>
            <shipping-lineitem>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "net-price"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "tax"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "gross-price"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "base-price"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "lineitem-text"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "tax-basis"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "item-id"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "shipment-id"></@incx>
	            <@incx ShippingLineItem "tax-rate"></@incx>
            </shipping-lineitem>
            </#list>
        	</shipping-lineitems>
		</#if>        	
        <shipments>
	        <#list Order.shipments as Shipment>
            <shipment shipment-id="${Shipment.id}">
            	<#if Shipment['shipping-status']??>
                <status>
                    <shipping-status>${Shipment['shipping-status']}</shipping-status>
                </status>
                </#if>
                <@incx Shipment "shipping-method"></@incx>
                <#if Shipment['shipping-address']??>
                <shipping-address>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "first-name"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "last-name"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "Address1"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "address1"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "city"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "postal-code"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "state-code"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "country-code"></@incx>
	                <@incx Shipment['shipping-address'] "phone"></@incx>
                </shipping-address>
                </#if>
                <@incx Shipment "gift"></@incx>
                <#if Shipment['totals']??>
                <totals>
                	<#if Shipment.totals['merchandize-total']??>
                    <merchandize-total>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['merchandize-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['merchandize-total'] "tax"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['merchandize-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
                    </merchandize-total>
                    </#if>
                	<#if Shipment.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total']??>
                    <adjusted-merchandize-total>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total'] "tax"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
                    </adjusted-merchandize-total>
                    </#if>
                	<#if Shipment.totals['shipping-total']??>
                    <shipping-total>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['shipping-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['shipping-total'] "tax"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['shipping-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
                    </shipping-total>
                    </#if>
                	<#if Shipment.totals['adjusted-shipping-total']??>
                    <adjusted-shipping-total>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['adjusted-shipping-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['adjusted-shipping-total'] "tax"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['adjusted-shipping-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
                    </adjusted-shipping-total>
                    </#if>
                	<#if Shipment.totals['shipment-total']??>
                    <shipment-total>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['shipment-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['shipment-total'] "tax"></@incx>
		                <@incx Shipment.totals['shipment-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
                    </shipment-total>
                    </#if>
                </totals>
                </#if>
            </shipment>
            </#list>
        </shipments>
        <#if Order['totals']??>
        <totals>
			<#if Order.totals['merchandize-total']??>
			<merchandize-total>
				<@incx Order.totals['merchandize-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['merchandize-total'] "tax"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['merchandize-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
			</merchandize-total>
			</#if>
			<#if Order.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total']??>
			<adjusted-merchandize-total>
				<@incx Order.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total'] "tax"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['adjusted-merchandize-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
			</adjusted-merchandize-total>
			</#if>
			<#if Order.totals['shipping-total']??>
			<shipping-total>
				<@incx Order.totals['shipping-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['shipping-total'] "tax"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['shipping-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
			</shipping-total>
			</#if>
			<#if Order.totals['adjusted-shipping-total']??>
			<adjusted-shipping-total>
				<@incx Order.totals['adjusted-shipping-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['adjusted-shipping-total'] "tax"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['adjusted-shipping-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
			</adjusted-shipping-total>
			</#if>
			<#if Order.totals['order-total']??>
			<order-total>
				<@incx Order.totals['order-total'] "net-price"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['order-total'] "tax"></@incx>
				<@incx Order.totals['order-total'] "gross-price"></@incx>
			</order-total>
			</#if>       
        </totals>
        </#if>
        <payments>
        	<#if Order['payments']??>
	        <#list Order.payments as Payment>
            <payment>
            	<#if Payment['credit-card']??>
                <credit-card>
                    <card-type>${Payment['credit-card']['card-type']}</card-type>
                    <card-number>${Payment['credit-card']['card-number']}</card-number>
                    <card-holder>${Payment['credit-card']['card-holder']}</card-holder>
                    <expiration-month>${Payment['credit-card']['expiration-month']}</expiration-month>
                    <expiration-year>${Payment['credit-card']['expiration-year']}</expiration-year>
                </credit-card>
                </#if>
                <@incx Payment "amount"></@incx>
                <@incx Payment "processor-id"></@incx>
            </payment>
            </#list>
            </#if>
        </payments>
        <@incx Order "remote-host"></@incx>
    </order>
    </#list>
</orders>
</#compress>
